title: SEDAN Score for Post-tPA Hemorrhage
desc: The SEDAN score assesses symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage (sICH) risk after thrombolysis.

orgreference.text: Strbian D, Engelter S, Michel P, Meretoja A, Sekoranja L, Ahlhelm FJ, Mustanoja S, Kuzmanovic I, Sairanen T, Forss N, Cordier M, Lyrer P, Kaste M, Tatlisumak T.Symptomatic intracranial hemorrhage after stroke thrombolysis: the SEDAN score. Ann Neurol. 2012 May;71(5):634-41. doi: 10.1002/ana.23546.

other_refer.text: Van Hooff RJ, et al. Validation assessment of risk tools to predict outcome after thrombolytic therapy for acute ischemic stroke.Clin Neurol Neurosurg. 2014 Oct;125:189-93. doi: 10.1016/j.clineuro.2014.08.011. Epub 2014 Aug 15.
